definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Two benzene rings from two B15C5 molecules are cis orientation with respect to potassium ion.
sentences.chinese: 兩個苯並15冠5的苯環相對鉀原子呈順式排列。

sentences.english: Oxidizing sidechain alkyl of benzene ring is one of the most important reactions in the organic synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 苯環側鏈氧化是有機合成反應中的重要反應類型之一。

sentences.english: In addition, these ligands showed higher activity than thioether deveritives of phenyl oxazolines.
sentences.chinese: 而且和苯環衍生的硫噁唑啉相比反應活性相對較高。

sentences.english: The benzene ring is also seen in other compounds .
sentences.chinese: 苯環在其他化合物中也可以看見。

sentences.english: These groups may be substituted in the phenyl ring.
sentences.chinese: 這些基團有取代的苯環。

sentences.english: If you have benzene, for example, the lowest electronic state, is quite far below the first excited state.
sentences.chinese: 比如苯環，也就是最低電子態，遠低於第一激發態。
